items: Would you rather explore a magical forest or dive into an underwater kingdom?
Would you rather have a pet dragon or a pet unicorn?
Would you rather be able to teleport anywhere or be invisible at will?
Would you rather have the power to fly or the power to breathe underwater?
Would you rather go on a treasure hunt or explore a haunted mansion?
Would you rather be a famous knight in a fairytale or a legendary wizard?
Would you rather travel to every country in the world or explore outer space?
Would you rather spend a year living on a tropical island or in a cozy cabin in the mountains?
Would you rather go on a cross-country road trip with friends or take a solo trip around the world?
Would you rather visit a new city every day or spend a year getting to know one city really well?
Would you rather travel by hot air balloon or by a submarine?
Would you rather only be able to eat sweet foods or only be able to eat salty foods?
Would you rather have to put hot sauce on everything or have to eat every meal cold?
Would you rather only eat pizza for a week or only eat pasta for a week?
Would you rather eat a dish made by the world's best chef once or eat your favorite home-cooked meal every day?
Would you rather give up chocolate or cheese for a year?
Would you rather be able to speak every language or play every instrument?
Would you rather be able to remember every book you've ever read or every movie you've ever watched?
Would you rather be an expert in one skill or be able to learn anything instantly but only at a beginner level?
Would you rather be able to control the weather or control time for 5 minutes each day?
Would you rather be able to always find lost things or know the answer to any question?
Would you rather have super strength or super speed?
Would you rather be able to read minds or be able to talk to animals?
Would you rather have night vision or the ability to see extremely far distances?
Would you rather be able to rewind time once per day or pause time for 10 seconds whenever you wanted?
Would you rather have super luck or super intelligence?
Would you rather always have to sing when you speak or always dance when you walk?
Would you rather have to wear a clown costume every day or a superhero costume every day?
Would you rather be followed by a tiny cloud that rains on you wherever you go or have to walk everywhere backwards?
Would you rather only be able to whisper or only be able to shout?
Would you rather always laugh uncontrollably when you're nervous or hiccup every time someone says your name?
Would you rather have unlimited airline tickets to any destination or never have to pay for food at restaurants?
Would you rather be able to drive any car or be able to speak any language fluently?
Would you rather live in a treehouse or in a houseboat?
Would you rather see a new sunset every day or a new sunrise every day?
Would you rather get a free tour of the world's most famous landmarks or a personal guide to the world's hidden gems?
Would you rather go on a camping trip with friends or have a movie marathon at home?
Would you rather play every board game in the world or every video game in the world?
Would you rather have to sing every word you say or shout every word you say?
Would you rather play hide and seek in a huge mansion or in a mysterious cave?
Would you rather never lose a game again or always make people laugh?
Would you rather eat a raw onion like an apple or drink pickle juice?
Would you rather walk around all day with wet socks or with sticky hands?
Would you rather have spaghetti for hair or broccoli for ears?
Would you rather have to smell like fish or have the hiccups forever?
Would you rather always have something stuck in your teeth or always have a piece of food stuck in your hair?
Would you rather be able to talk to birds or talk to fish?
Would you rather be as strong as an elephant or as fast as a cheetah?
Would you rather be able to fly like an eagle or climb like a monkey?
Would you rather have the eyes of an owl or the ears of a wolf?
Would you rather solve an ancient mystery or find a hidden treasure?
Would you rather be an astronaut exploring space or a deep-sea diver exploring the ocean?
Would you rather journey through a jungle or trek across a desert?
Would you rather discover a new species or find a new planet?
Would you rather be a character in a mystery novel or in a fantasy novel?
Would you rather be able to change colors like a chameleon or glow in the dark?
Would you rather sneeze glitter or yawn confetti?
Would you rather have ears that can hear from miles away or eyes that can zoom in like a camera?
Would you rather have fingers that can stretch or toes that can pick up anything?
Would you rather be able to talk to computers or plants?
Would you rather have a pet tiger that's super friendly or a pet eagle that you can fly with?
Would you rather be able to swim with dolphins or swing through trees with monkeys?
Would you rather live in a cozy treehouse in the forest or a peaceful house on the beach?
Would you rather be able to smell like a flower or look like a tree whenever you wanted?
Would you rather see the world through the eyes of a bird or the nose of a dog?
Would you rather travel 1,000 years into the past or 1,000 years into the future?
Would you rather meet a famous inventor or a famous artist?
Would you rather be able to visit your ancestors or meet your future descendants?
Would you rather experience life in ancient Egypt or in medieval Europe?
Would you rather watch your favorite historical event live or visit your favorite time period?
Would you rather live in a world where magic exists or in a world with advanced technology?
Would you rather be best friends with a giant or with a fairy?
Would you rather find a door to another world or a key that opens any door?
Would you rather ride a unicorn or a flying carpet?
Would you rather live in a castle on a cloud or in an underwater palace?
Would you rather be a famous artist whose paintings are worth millions or a famous musician whose songs everyone knows?
Would you rather be the most famous person in the world or the richest person in the world?
Would you rather be a hero in your own town or be known around the world as a mysterious legend?
Would you rather be a leader everyone loves or a leader everyone respects?
Would you rather invent something that changes the world or write a book that everyone reads?
Would you rather have a cozy blanket that keeps you warm no matter how cold it is or a pillow that makes you fall asleep instantly?
Would you rather live in a house with huge windows but no curtains or in a tiny cozy home underground?
Would you rather have a personal chef or a personal trainer?
Would you rather have a room filled with books or a room filled with art?
Would you rather sleep on the softest bed ever or in the coolest, breeziest room ever?
Would you rather only experience summer or only experience winter?
Would you rather live where it rains all the time or where it's always sunny but never rains?
Would you rather be able to make it snow whenever you wanted or make it rain whenever you wanted?
Would you rather watch a sunrise on a beach or a sunset in the mountains?
Would you rather go sledding on snowy hills or surfing on big waves?
Would you rather have hair that changes color with your mood or nails that change length with your emotions?
Would you rather always walk backward or always have to skip everywhere?
Would you rather eat only food you dislike for a year or have no taste at all for a month?
Would you rather be able to sneeze once every 5 minutes or hiccup once every 10 minutes?
Would you rather drink lemonade that tastes like chocolate or eat a burger that tastes like fruit?
Would you rather have dreams every night that are adventures or no dreams at all but wake up super refreshed?
Would you rather be able to jump into your favorite books or your favorite movies?
Would you rather be able to visit your best memories whenever you want or be able to forget your worst memories?
Would you rather live in a world with superheroes or in a world with wizards?
Would you rather be able to control your dreams or be able to make one dream come true?
